#summary Here are some other OpenSource chess projects and links related to chess.

  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gnu_chess GNU Chess]: a computer program which plays a full game of chess against a human or other computer program.
  * [http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenChess OpenChess] (de)
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ChessV ChessV]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crafty Crafty]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fruit_(chess_engine) Fruit]

  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Game_Notation Portable Game Notation]
